definition: to destroy/to smash
to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to destroy by fire/a blaze
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to defame/to slander

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽车被砸毁，大量伤者躺在街头。

sentences.english: Has destroyed Argentina's 5 "the super colors" the attack airplane.
sentences.chinese: 砸毁了阿根廷的5架“超级军旗”攻击机。
